protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturerâ€™s standard protocol

protocol.name: P-MTAB-4767
text: Plants were grown on soil for 30 days under short day conditions (8 hr light/16 hr darkness) at 23C and 65% relative humidity.
(Parameters: start time = 30, time unit = days, min temperature = 23, temperature unit = C)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-4768
protocol.text: Plants were grown on soil for 30 days under short day conditions (8 hr light/16 hr darkness) at 23C and 65% relative humidity. Plants where then shifted to long day conditions (16 hr light/8 hr darkness) at 23C and 65% relative humidity for 8 days. Inflorescence meristem were then dissected.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-4769
text: A pdf of the protocol 'Probe preparation (Development)' can be downloaded at
(Parameters: Extracted product = total_RNA, Amplification = RNA polymerases)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-4770
protocol.text: Plants were grown on soil for 30d under short day conditions (8h light/ 16h darkness) at 23C and 65% relative humidity. Shoot apical meristem were dissected.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-4771
protocol.text: Normalized data was generated using gcRMA
